description:
#### Tresorit
Tresorit is the ultra-secure place in the cloud to store, sync, and share files within your organization and with external partners.

#### Package updates
   
New versions of this package are published automatically via the `update.ps1` script (viewable in the package source on GitHub).
summary: Tresorit is the ultra-secure place in the cloud to store, sync, and share files within your organization and with external partners.
author: Tresorit AG
